# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "DemoRunner.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("DemoRunner")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED DemoRunner_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "DemoRunner_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(DemoRunner_jucer_FILE
  "${DemoRunner_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  JUCER_VERSION "6.0.5"
  PROJECT_FILE "${DemoRunner_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "yj7xMM"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "DemoRunner"
  PROJECT_VERSION "6.0.5"
  COMPANY_NAME "Raw Material Software Limited"

  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license

)
